formatted_address: 4607, Jalan Laksamana 2, Puteri Harbour, 79000 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Stay @ Almas Puteri Harbour

reviews.text: Planning to stay at this condo? Heads up â€“ my motorbike was targeted in the supposedly secure multi-story car park. Accessories vanished, and cables were cut, leaving my motorbike a mess. It's disappointing to see this happen here, making it feel no safer than known theft hotspots like KSL. If you're living here, please be extra vigilant with your vehicles.

To be actual this is not a hotel , so there will be no lobby for you to check in ,no room service. When you reach the suites building you will need to contact the staff who will bring the access card and key to you at the ground floor entrance  . The location wise is not convenient as eateries are less and most of the shops are vacant . You will need to drive out to eat , I don't know if getting private hired cars are possible as the district is far less than crowded .

The good point for this suite is that it's great for small family staycation if you are driving . The room layout which I stay is a twin queen size bed concept with kitchen , washing machine facilities .

The room is clean,tidy and neat . What I have to recommend is that the view when staying at high storey is magnificent. You can clearly see the west northern side of Singapore.

At the price of S$50+ through internet reservation and payment . This is a good choice for family stay.

Excellent! Stunning and amazed!
1) Very clean
2) Very comfortable
3) All equipped well with free Netflix
4) Affordable
5) Host is humble, helpful and prompt reply.

Too good to stay here. Thanks to the host for the free upgrade when my room had some technical issue. The host is very considerate to my needs. This is the best Airbnb i ever stayed

Check in at 27th floor. Very high and scared to stand at balcony. We have view of Singapore across the strait. Room is very tidy, clean and lemon fragrance. Will check in again in the future. Thanks to Stephanie, owner of this home.

vicinity: 4607, Jalan Laksamana 2, Puteri Harbour, Iskandar Puteri
